item.title: All Roblox BrawlR Codes & Rewards—Every August 2025 Active Code
item.content:encoded:
BrawlR is a swashbuckling fighting game in Roblox. Here’s everything you need to know about the game’s reward codes.

BrawlR is a Roblox game that allows players to go on an epic adventure as various characters from fiction and mythology. Like many other new games in Roblox, reward codes are bound to arrive sooner or later.

Here’s everything we know so far about reward codes in this new game.

Are There Any Active BrawlR? (August 2025)

As of August 2025, there are no active Roblox BrawlR codes.

However, this likely won’t be for long, as Roblox games add new codes all the time, so check back soon to see if any have been added.

How to Redeem Roblox BrawlR Codes

To redeem codes in Roblox BrawlR, follow the steps below:

  1. Launch Roblox and then the BrawlR game.
  2. Click on the ‘Codes’ option.
  3. Type in the code you want and press Enter.

If the code is still live, you’ll then receive the above reward. Don’t forget that every code can only be used once per player account.

Are There Any Expired BrawlR Codes?

As no codes have been added to BrawlR yet, none have expired yet.

This is where we’ll keep a log of expired codes when we have some.

Where to Find New Roblox BrawlR Codes

If you want to always know what the current reward codes are, then make sure you bookmark this page. That’s because we’ll update it regularly and will be sure to keep it up to date, that is, once some codes arrive.

Are you a big fan of action-adventure games in Roblox? Then be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can start up some fun new discussions.

While you’re having fun with Roblox, check out our code guides for other games, such as Steal an Anime, Steal a Brainrot, and Steal a Star Wars.

item.title: All Roblox Kick a Brainrot Codes & Rewards—Every August 2025 Active Code
item.content:encoded:
You’ve stolen a Brainrot in Roblox, now it’s time to kick one. The only question is, can reward codes make your life easier in Kick a Brainrot in Roblox?

Following on from Steal a Brainrot in Roblox, Kick a Brainrot takes things to a whole new level! Like the last Brainrot game, it’s a Roblox experience; the game also contains reward codes to help you with your kicking.

So below, we’ll reveal all of the active codes this month. We’ll also keep a log of all the expired codes as and when they are discontinued.

All Roblox Kick a Brainrot Codes (August 2025)

As of August 2025, these are all the active codes.

Make sure you use them before they expire, as most codes in Roblox eventually do.

How to Redeem Roblox Kick a Brainrot Codes

When the time comes to redeem codes in the game, follow the steps below:

  1. Launch Roblox and then the Kick a Brainrot game.
  2. Click on the ‘Codes’ option on the right side of the screen.
  3. Type in the code you want and press Enter.

If the code is still live, you’ll then receive the above reward. Don’t forget, every code can only be used once per player account.

Are There Any Expired Roblox Kick a Brainrot Codes?

As no codes have been added yet, none have expired yet.

This is where we’ll keep a log of expired codes once some have come and gone.

Where to Find New Roblox Kick a Brainrot Codes

If you want to always know what the current reward codes are, then make sure you bookmark this page. That’s because we’ll update it regularly and will be sure to keep it up to date when the codes start coming in.

Are you a big fan of the “Build A” Roblox games? Then be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can start up some fun new discussions.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Price Possibly Revealed by GameStop, and It’s Shockingly Low
item.content:encoded:
It has been discovered by eagle-eyed Hollow Knight fans that Silksong has been listed on GameStop on Nintendo Switch for just $19.99. This price has prompted many to believe it’s a ‘simply a placeholder’ because they can’t understand why Team Cherry isn’t charging more for one of the most anticipated games of 2025.

It’s worth stressing that users have reportedly tried to check out with Hollow Knight: Silksong in their basket at that price, but it ‘does not go through.’

Is Hollow Knight: Silksong Just $19.99?

In a post that surfaced on the Hollow Knight subreddit, it was revealed that GameStop has priced the upcoming title at just $19.99.

When Hollow Knight was released way back in 2017, it came with a price tag of just $14.99, but it was a brand-new title from a remarkably small team. It was said that Team Cherry wanted to make the game accessible to more players, which is still a theme prevalent among some small studios today.

The lowest price Hollow Knight dropped to is around $5.99.

On Reddit, users started debating the price, with some being bewildered that Team Cherry isn’t pushing the popularity of the game to charge more. One user wrote, ‘I was ready to pay 40 bucks. Am I crazy? I’m not even as big a fan as you guys, but it’s been the going rate for quality games, especially if they’re a sequel to a well-loved one.’

Many stressed that Team Cherry doesn’t need to charge more because ‘they are really rich because of Hollow Knight.’

Another user pointed out how the price is potentially harmful to subscription services:

Wild if true.

At that price there’s basically zero reason to play it on Game Pass unless you already have it. PC Game Pass is $12 a month, Xbox is $15. A few more $ to keep the game for life is a no brainer honestly.

Hollow Knight: Silksong will be released on September 4 after years of painstaking waiting. Are you going to pick it up, whatever the price is? Let me know on the Insider Gaming forum.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Paramount wants a Call of Duty movie

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
